#labels Featured,Phase-Support

==Advanced configuration==
advanced configuration provided in scheme2ddl.config.xml

What can be configured:

1) Types of object you want to export out
{{{
    <util:set id="types_for_getting_DDL">
        <value>TABLE</value>
        <value>MATERIALIZED VIEW</value>
        <value>TRIGGER</value>
    </util:set>
}}}

2) dependable objects to include in main DDL of object 
(for example, triggers for tables, or object grants on view)
configured in {{{ <property name="map"> inside "dao" bean }}}

{{{
        <property name="map">
            <map>
                <entry key="TABLE">
                    <set>
                        <value>COMMENT</value>
                        <value>INDEX</value>
                        <value>OBJECT_GRANT</value>
                        <value>TRIGGER</value>
                    </set>
                </entry>
}}}

3) output options in bean "fileWorker"
{{{
    <bean id="fileWorker" ...>
        <property name="outputPath" value="D:/temp/oracle-ddl2svn/TEST/"/>
        <property name="sortByDirectory" value="true"/>
        <property name="fileExtension" value="sql"/>
    </bean>
}}}

4) transformParams for dbms_metadata 
{{{
    <util:map id="transformParams_for_dbms_metadata">
        <entry key="SEGMENT_ATTRIBUTES" value="0"/>
        <entry key="SQLTERMINATOR" value="1"/>
        <entry key="CONSTRAINTS_AS_ALTER" value="1"/>
    </util:map>
}}}

5) format DDL options
{{{
    <bean id="ddlFormatter" ...>
        <property name="statementOnNewLine" value="true"/>
    </bean>
}}}

6) default db url
{{{
    <bean id="dataSource" ...>
        <property name="URL" value="jdbc:oracle:thin:scott/tiger@localhost:1521:ORCL"/>
    </bean>
}}}

7) filter objects by age
{{{
    <property name="last_ddl_time_age" value="0"/>
}}}
if value>0 it produce SQL where condition {{{last_ddl_time>=sysdate-objectsAge}}}
